ciso_update_cost = {
	owner = {
		set_local_variable = {
			name = temp
			value = ciso_total_government_investment
		}
		remove_modifier = ciso_cost_of_measures
		add_modifier = {
			name = ciso_cost_of_measures
			multiplier = local_var:temp
		}
	}
}
